snippet: Basketball’s governing body, FIBA, opened disciplinary proceedings against Australia over allegations that it lost a World Cup game against Angola.
abstract: Basketball’s governing body, FIBA, opens disciplinary proceedings against Australia over allegations that it lost a World Cup game against Angola in order to delay an encounter with the United States.
lead_paragraph: Basketball’s governing body, FIBA, opened disciplinary proceedings against Australia over allegations that it lost a World Cup game against Angola.
